description: Numbers m = usigma(sigma(n))/n such that usigma(sigma(n)) is divisible by n.
comments: a(n) = m values in A045795. - _Donovan Johnson_, Mar 12 2013
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
maple: A034448 := proc(n) local ans, i: ans := 1: for i from 1 to nops(ifactors(n)[ 2 ]) do ans := ans*(1+ifactors(n)[2][i][1]^ifactors(n)[2][i][2]): od: RETURN(ans) end: isA045795 := proc(n) if A034448(numtheory[sigma](n)) mod n = 0 then A034448(numtheory[sigma](n))/n ; else -1 ; fi ; end: A045796 := proc() local n,a : n := 2: while true do a := isA045795(n) ; if a>=0 then printf("%d, ",a) ; fi ; n := n+1: od : end: A045796() ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 26 2007
author: _Yasutoshi Kohmoto_
extensions: Corrected and extended by _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 26 2007
Missing first term added and offset corrected by _Donovan Johnson_, Mar 12 2013
